channel.title: Cleared Samples?
channel.description:
Okay so I’m not planning on doing this anytime soon but...
If I wanted to make money from my Auxy music, are the samples cleared, as in, are they free to use (if we’ve bought them)? I don’t have premium but I have all the older sound packs.

item.title: Cleared Samples?
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
CDM Create Digital Music – 1 Dec 08

All Fruity, No Loops: FL Studio to Remove All Melodic Samples; Murky License,...

Deadmau5 roars, and FL drops all melodic content? Hey, whatever – FL users stay loyal to their app and it’s now BYO sample time. Photo (CC) iamdonte. The FL Studio community was rocked earlier this month as producer Deadmau5 claimed the use of his...

If you want a little Monday reading it’s interesting. This is ten years old at this point I think but it’s still interesting to see how muddy the waters can get

Read full topic

item.title: Cleared Samples?
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Even if the scenario that @iammane describes happens here, you’ll be in the clear, as you’re paying to license the samples ‘in good faith’ - i.e. trusting Auxy’s assurances that they’re all cleared.

If that turns out to be wrong, they’ll be the ones getting sued, not you.

Read full topic

item.title: Cleared Samples?
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
I’m reasonably sure anything included in Auxy is good to go.

HOWEVER, there was that one little faux pas Image Line did with including a drum loop from “Faxing Berlin” in their sound pack and Deadmau5 ended up getting legally involved. This was a few years ago I don’t remember exactly what happened, but I’m hoping everyone’s learned a lesson from that incident lol…

Read full topic
